title: PRD ReDesign: RX Category Page
background_context: The RX Category Page serves as the main gateway for users exploring prescription treatments on DoktorABC. It must communicate trust, professionalism, and simplicity while leading users efficiently toward starting a consultation.

personas.new_visitors: Arrive via search engines or campaigns, looking for trustworthy online consultation for prescription treatment
personas.returning_visitors: Have purchased before or used another treatment category, expect consistency and reliability

success_metrics: +20% increase in conversion from RX category page → start consultation
+10% improvement in conversion from RX category page → paid order

key_sections.requirements: Displays general USPs identical to homepage
Company logo, search button, hamburger menu
Hero image, title, USP content, CTA button 'Start a consultation', Trusted Shops widget, 3 visual stories, RX-specific USPs
Title 'Search here by product name', prominent search bar
Reuse existing 3-step visual component from homepage
Visual display of subcategories/treatments similar to homepage category grid
Carousel of 3-5 short marketing videos with creator name, age, short quote/testimonial
Doctor photo + specialization, content about doctor (ASO text), CTA 'Learn more'
5-7 FAQs about RX treatments and consultation process
Supplementary text from ASO (educational or informational)
Banner promoting newsletter or special offers, user can input email or close banner
Links to related content or policies (from ASO)
Standard site footer with logo, navigation links, certifications, payment methods, address, disclaimer

development_requirements.description: Every RX Category Page built in consistent structure order with all components listed above
Category image from BO, breadcrumb navigation, main title from BO, subtitle from BO, CTA button with category colors, sticky behavior
Display pricing line with dynamic numbers from DB
Integrate Trusted Shops widget exactly as in production
Fixed USPs: Prescription online, Delivered 1-2 days, Original German medicine, Advice via questionnaire
Search component specific to current RX category, shows only products in this category
Standard component with same design and logic as other pages
Questions and answers pulled from BO, first question open by default, localized
Standard Customer Reviews component, pulls reviews from DB
Horizontal strip of payment method logos
Content exactly as implemented in production, using same DB source
DoktorABC privacy banner component, localized for each country
